author: Cox Media Group National Content Desk
title: Athletes, celebs react after controversial Utley slide breaks...
text:
Was Chase Utley playing dirty or just playing to win? Social media was in an uproar Saturday night after the Los Angeles Dodgers second baseman slid into the New York Mets' Ruben Tejada, breaking the shortstop's leg.
>> Read more trending stories
The Dodgers went on to win the game 5-2, tying the National League Division Series 1-1.
Click here or scroll down to see what athletes, celebrities and members of the sports media had to say about the controversial play.
